sourceMeaningMnemonic: The <radical>barracks</radical> radical and the <kanji>barracks</kanji> kanji are the same!
readingMnemonic: <kanji>Barracks</kanji> are pretty big, so they weigh a <reading>ton</reading> (<ja>とん</ja>). And they probably take tons of materials to build.
readingInfo: Imagine trying to lift some barracks. They weigh a ton! How are you supposed to do this? Why would you even try to lift something that obviously weighs a couple tons?!
